attributes.action: Build A Mini Gym At Every Single Doctors Surgery, Hospital And Health Clinic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People can't afford to get to a gym and even afford the membership.

Would it not be a great idea for all the doctors surgeries, hospitials and health clinics to all have a mini gym built onto them so people can make appoinments to use them for free?

The UK is becoming a country full of big people now and the goverment is not doing anything to help this situation so this is a great idea.

Obviously people would have to make appointments to use the mini gym.

Please sign the petition to get this done or something very similar done.
